features: SWEET HONEYDEW SCENT - Chemical Guys Honeydew Scent offers a delightful and refreshing fragrance of ripe honeydew melon, transforming your car's interior into a tropical paradise.
ELIMINATES FOUL ODORS - Say goodbye to unpleasant smells with the powerful odor eliminators in Honeydew Scent, leaving your car with a pleasant and captivating aroma.
VERSATILE APPLICATION - Not just for cars, enjoy the Honeydew Scent's tropical goodness in your home, office, or any space that could use a burst of fresh and fruity fragrance.
QUICK BURST OF FRESHNESS - Formulated with advanced technology, this air freshener ensures a fresh scent that keeps your car smelling sweet and inviting, apply additional bursts as needed!
EASY APPLICATION - With a simple spray, infuse your surroundings with the luscious scent of honeydew, turning every drive into a revitalizing escape.

THE GO TO BRAND IN CAR CARE - Car lovers choose Chemical Guys, not only for the finest car care products, but the world class customer support and vast detailing knowledge Chemical Guys is more than a brand it's a lifestyle with a worldwide following
body.description: Honeydew Scent - a soothing air freshener that brings the delightful fragrance of ripe honeydew melon to your car's interior! Experience a tropical paradise during every drive as the sweet scent fills your car with the scent of an oceanside vacation. Say goodbye to foul odors with the powerful odor eliminators, leaving your car refreshed and captivating. This versatile air freshener can be used in your home, office, or any space that needs a burst of fresh and fruity fragrance. With easy application, a simple spray infuses your surroundings with the luscious scent of honeydew, turning every drive into a revitalizing escape. Elevate your car's ambiance with Chemical Guys Honeydew Scent and enjoy a sweet and refreshing journey wherever you go!How To Use:1. Clean and vacuum any debris that may be imparting foul smells into the automobile interior.2. Shake well.3. Lightly mist your preferred air freshener around carpets, cloth upholstery and under seats.4. For AC flushing service, set AC to max cold and recirculate, and mist a few sprays of the preferred scent underneath the recirculation intake under the dashboard on the passenger side.5. Enjoy fresh scent.6. Repeat as necessary.We make looking good so easy. Visit the Chemical Guys Store on Amazon to see our entire Arsenal; find Pro Tips, Special Promotions, and New Product Launches; Link at the top of the page, Click Follow!Works safely on all automotive vehicle brands including: Acura, Audi, BMW, Buick, Cadillac, Chevrolet (Chevy), Chrysler, Dodge, Fisker, Ford, GMC, Honda, Hummer, Hyundai, Infiniti, Isuzu, Jaguar, Jeep, Kia, Land Rover, Lexus, Lincoln, Mazda, Mercedes, Mercury, Mini, Mitsubishi, Nissan, Pontiac, Porsche, RAM, Saab, Subaru, Tesla, Toyota, Volkswagen, and Volvo; and RV brands like Coachmen, Entegra, Forest River, Newmar, Thor Motor Coach, Winnebago, AirStream, K-Z, Keystone and Midwest Automotive Designs

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Chemical Guys Honeydew Premium Air Freshener and Odor Eliminator Say hello to honeydew: the luscious fruit renowned for its refreshing scent and sweet taste! It is known worldwide as the 'Money Melon,' and even the 'King of Fruits' in Japan. The unique scent of honeydew is nothing short of extraordinary, legendary, and irresistible. Chemical Guys Honeydew Air Freshener & Odor Neutralizer is a premium long-lasting air freshener with exclusive odor elimination agents that physically destroy foul odors at their source. No matter where you use Honeydew Air Freshener & Odor Neutralizer, it is sure to bring the scent of cool, refreshing, sun-kissed slices of vine-ripened melon to any environment. The unique formula does more than mask foul odors; it actually kills odor-causing bacteria to completely remove bad smells. Chemical Guys Honeydew Air Freshener & Odor Neutralizer works fast to freshen air, eliminate odors, and reduce the recurrence of unpleasant odors. We engineered Honeydew Air Freshener with active odor eliminators and neutralizers to rapidly subdue undesirable smells right at the source. Honeydew Air Freshener & Odor Eliminator pleases the senses with the refreshing, sweet, and crisp scent of fresh honeydew melon. Honeydew is the perfect scent for a bright sunny day! Honeydew Air Freshener & Odor Eliminator is enriched with fruity overtones, delivering a fresh scent that lasts weeks, not days. One spray is all you need for a full size vehicle. Enjoy the luscious scent of a bright sunny day with Chemical Guys Honeydew Air Freshener & Odor Eliminator. Product Benefits Water-based fragrances won't stain fabrics, carpets or upholstery Eliminates odors and reduces new odors over time Ready to use but can be diluted if desired Delicious and refreshing scent of fresh Honeydew melon

It’s sunshine in every spray! The fresh scent of Honeydew Air Freshener will fill your car with the relaxing scent of vacation and simple times. It’s the scent for the moments when you haven’t a care in the world. Honeydew Air Freshener removes nasty odors using an advanced odor neutralizer. Easily eliminate food, body, and pet odors from any car, truck, and RV. Great for household and hotel use. One spray is all you need to experience relaxation. Enjoy Chemical Guys Honeydew thoroughly, and often. Chemical Guys brews air fresheners and odor eliminators with premium essential oils. Honeydew is blended with special olfactory stimulants isolated from premium ripe honeydew melons. One spray of Honeydew sends you on vacation from your troubles, refreshing mind, body, and soul for a relaxing time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell doesn't last but gets rid of odors
reviews.reviewText: Very good scent but it doesn't last too long, good for eliminating odors but not for long time air scents

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honeydew you want a fresh-smelling car? You need this!
reviews.reviewText: If you're tired of your car smelling like sweaty gym socks or old fast food, then this Honeydew air freshener is a lifesaver. It's like a breath of fresh air that also eliminates nasty odors.Pros:The honeydew scent is deliciously fresh and fruity, making my car smell like a tropical paradise.The compact size of the bottle makes it easy to store in your car or take on the go.It's not overpowering or artificial-smelling like some air fresheners can be.It lasts a long time, so you don't have to constantly reapply it.Cons:The smell might make you crave a honeydew smoothie, but that's not really a bad thing, is it?Overall, if you want to upgrade your car's scent game, this Honeydew air freshener is the way to go. Your passengers (and your nose) will thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not strong enough
reviews.reviewText: It smells good when you first spray it but the smell disappears quickly :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good smell but doesn’t last.
reviews.reviewText: Smells great. Doesn’t last but 5 minutes. More of an Instant Air Freshener.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good scent not too strong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic honeydew scent
reviews.reviewText: Scent is on point. Compliments the honeydew scented carwash from Chemical Guys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Scent doesn't last long
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell just doesn't last long The scent goes away quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've switched to Chemical Guys & their products are amazing. This scent is pretty strong but sadly this scent doesn't last as long as i wanted it to. It does last a few days.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lovely sweet fragrance. A star deducted since I can't smell ...
reviews.reviewText: Lovely sweet fragrance. A star deducted since I can't smell it after a few hours. Dilute it 1:3 - the smell is similar and it at least becomes more economical.
Not a bad smell...maybe could be stronger and sweeter

reviews.reviewTitle: decevant ne reste meme pas une seconde
reviews.reviewText: vaut pas la peine,l'odeur reste pas
